visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts donut chart with the following specifications: Chart type: pie, Chart title: '2023 Norway car registrations', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for labels and titles, Data series: Include series names 'EV', 'Hybrids', 'Diesel', and 'Petrol' with corresponding percentages 23.9%, 12.6%, 37.0%, and 26.4% respectively, Custom colors: Use specific colors for each segment - EV: #4CAF50, Hybrids: #FFC107, Diesel: #F44336, Petrol: #2196F3, Additional configurations: Set the inner size of the donut to 75%, disable the legend, and add a custom label in the center of the chart displaying 'Total' with the value '2,877,820'.

events.render:
function() { const chart = this, series = chart.series[0]; let customLabel = chart.options.chart.custom.label; if (!customLabel) { customLabel = chart.options.chart.custom.label = chart.renderer.label('Total
2,877,820').css({ color: '#FFF', textAnchor: 'middle' }).add(); } const x = series.center[0] + chart.plotLeft, y = series.center[1] + chart.plotTop - (customLabel.attr('height') / 2); customLabel.attr({ x, y }); customLabel.css({ fontSize: `${series.center[2] / 12}px` }); }

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a donut chart with specific customizations. The chart type is set to 'pie', and the title is '2023 Norway car registrations'. The background of the chart is dark, with white text for labels and titles, enhancing readability. The data series includes four categories: 'EV', 'Hybrids', 'Diesel', and 'Petrol', each with its corresponding percentage and a custom color. The inner size of the donut is set to 75%, creating a distinct donut shape. The legend is disabled, and a custom label is added in the center of the chart, displaying 'Total' with the value '2,877,820'. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart that meets the specified requirements.
